Ward No. 1 Dhaka South City Corporation () is an administrative division of Dhaka South City Corporation in zone 1, which was formerly known as ward no. 24 of Dhaka City Corporation. It's located in Khilgaon Thana of Dhaka City. It forms a city corporation council electoral constituency and is a part of Bangladesh Jatiyo Sangshad constituency Dhaka-9.
Overview
The ward covers Blocks A and C under Khilgaon Thana.
